# Secret FS
## Crypto , Pwn 195
> 69 solved

* Bypass the check, then overflow the `e` in global.
* `.txt` -> `t` -> e = 0x74 = 116
![](https://github.com/ssspeedgit00/CTF/blob/master/2017/HITCON_2017_quals/Secret_FS/pic.png)

```python
#!/usr/bin/env python
from libnum import *

# hitcon{WoW!y0u_c4n_d3crypt_RSA!!!!}

n = 

e = 3
e2 = 116

flag = 
flag2 = 

#xgcd( 3 , 116 ) = (39, -1, 1)

print n2s( ( flag ** 39 ) * invmod( flag2 , n ) % n )
```
